snippet: The doctor, who attended five executions in 2010 and 2011 as a “medical team leader,” discussed execution methods, training and even the payment for his efforts.
lead_paragraph: The doctor, who attended five executions in 2010 and 2011 as a “medical team leader,” discussed execution methods, training and even the payment for his efforts.

headline.main: Excerpts From Arizona Doctor’s Deposition on Executions
